mapper.sql: ID, NAME, COM_NAME, COM_URL, CONTACT, PHONE, PASSWORD, INVITEDCODE, REMARKS, CREATER, UPDATER, IS_DELETED, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_TIME, TOKEN, LOGIN_IP, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, VERSION, HEDEHREF, SOURCE
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tds_user WHERE ID=#{id} AND IS_DELETED=0

SELECT
FROM tds_user WHERE PHONE=#{phone} AND IS_DELETED=0
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tds_user
NAME , COM_NAME , COM_URL , CONTACT , PHONE , PASSWORD , INVITEDCODE , REMARKS , CREATER , UPDATER , UPDATE_TIME , CREATE_TIME , TOKEN , LOGIN_IP , LAST_LOGIN_TIME , VERSION , HEDEHREF , SOURCE , IS_DELETED
#{name} , #{comName} , #{comUrl} , #{contact} , #{phone} , #{password} , #{invitedcode} , #{remarks} , #{creater} , #{updater} , #{updateTime} , #{createTime} , #{token} , #{loginIp} , #{lastLoginTime} , #{version} , #{hedehref} , #{source} , 0
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tds_user
AND ID = #{id}, AND NAME = #{name}, AND COM_NAME = #{comName}, AND COM_URL = #{comUrl}, AND CONTACT = #{contact}, AND PHONE = #{phone}, AND PASSWORD = #{password}, AND INVITEDCODE = #{invitedcode}, AND REMARKS = #{remarks}, AND CREATER = #{creater}, AND UPDATER = #{updater}, AND IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted}, AND UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime}, AND CREATE_TIME = #{createTime}, AND TOKEN = #{token}, AND LOGIN_IP = #{loginIp}, AND LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime}, AND VERSION = #{version}, AND HEDEHREF = #{hedehref}, AND SOURCE = #{source}, AND IS_DELETED =0 ORDER BY ID DESC
LIMIT #{currentPage},#{numPerPage}
SELECT count(1) FROM tds_user where IS_DELETED =0 ORDER BY ID DESC
SELECT COUNT(NAME) FROM tds_user where name=#{name} and is_deleted='0'
